text: Ugo Fangareggi (30 January 1938 â€“ 20 October 2017) was an Italian actor and voice actor. He was born in Genoa, Italy. He was best known for the role of Mangold in Mario Monicelli's The Incredible Army of Brancaleone. Fangareggi died of Parkinson's disease at the age of 79. == References == == Other websites == * Category:1938 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Actors from Genoa Category:Italian stage actors Category:Italian movie actors Category:Italian television actors Category:Deaths from Parkinson's disease
title: Ugo Fangareggi
